### Vehicle Inspection, Maintenance, and Repair Services

#### Notice of Opportunity

Fisheries and Oceans Canada is seeking a contractor to provide vehicle inspection, maintenance, and repair services for its fleet of vehicles in Quebec, Canada.

#### Background

The department has a fleet of approximately 50 vehicles, including automobiles, vans, and light trucks, located in Quebec. The contractor will be responsible for providing various services, including routine maintenance, mechanical repairs, bodywork, and tire installation, as well as storing all vehicle tires.

#### Services Required

* Routine maintenance according to manufacturer-recommended programs and use
* Mechanical repairs following breakdowns
* Bodywork repairs
* Tire installation and balancing
* Tire storage
* Windshield repair and replacement
* Vehicle transportation (between DFO establishments and the contractor's facilities)

#### Requirements

* The contractor must provide all necessary materials, parts, equipment, and labor to respond to the department's needs
* The contractor must accept the ARI-Holman credit card as a payment method
* Services are F.O.B. Destination, with the contractor responsible for transporting vehicles from one location to another
* The contractor must maintain a reliable fleet of vehicles for transportation purposes
* The contractor must provide proof of insurance for various aspects, including civil liability, collision, vandalism, theft, windshield, and fire

#### Evaluation Criteria

* The contractor's ability to provide the necessary services
* The contractor's reliability and efficiency
* The contractor's financial stability and ability to meet payment obligations
* The contractor's ability to store all vehicle tires

#### Procedure for Requesting Services

* The department will send written orders or telephone notifications to the contractor as needed
* The contractor will be required to complete a maintenance record for each vehicle and attach it to the invoice
* The contractor will be required to maintain a file of maintenance records for each vehicle and make it available to the department upon request

#### Important Notes

* The contractor must respect the Department's standards for vehicle maintenance and inspection
* The contractor must comply with the ARI-Holman management company's procedures for managing expenses associated with Departmental vehicles
* The contractor must obtain approval from the Department's technical authority before performing any work with an estimated cost over $100
